Title: Allies in the Shadows
Description:
The Shado-Pan arrived here before we did, and they are already at work undermining the Thunder King's forces.

I want you to meet with Taran Zhu, the leader of the Shado-Pan, and offer your services on behalf of the Kirin Tor. I doubt he is truly in need of the aid, but the gesture holds importance in itself.
ObjectivesText: Speak to Taran Zhu in Bleak Hollow.
